name: Robot Repair
description:
A game by Ryan Brooks, Kayla Weber, and Sam Gothelf

Made for Global Game Jam 2020

The player works in a factory where they must repair broken robots by adding power cores to the correct wires. The monitor in the player's work space details which wires must be active to repair the robot. 

Controls: WASD to move 

Hold Left Shift to Speed Walk 

Space to Jump 

Left Click to Interact (Pickup/Drop/Place Power Cores and Press Buttons) 

Right Click to Throw Held Power Cores
